DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate whether propofol can improve quality of recovery compared to desflurane in patients undergoing robotic or laparoscopic gastrectomy.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Desflurane and Propofol on Quality of Recovery in Patients Undergoing Robotic or Laparoscopic Gastrectomy
DOC.criteria: adult patients aged over 20 yrs who are scheduled for laparoscopic or robotic gastrectomy, ASA 1 or 2. patients with allergy to anesthetic agents body mass index more than 35 kg/m2 pregnancy
